author: assaf
msg: Broke up sections in contributing page, so it's easier to find stuff from the ToC; added plug for using Git.
Added sub-section for using development builds.
Main page now links directly to getting started page and PDF.
rake apache:snapshot now runs test cases before packaging.

author: assaf
msg: - Sidebar has new titles for some of the groupings, titles in green
- Sidebar moved further to the left
- Green also used for table headers
- H3 no longer uses bottom border, H1-H3 indented further to the left
- As for Web site, also fixed indentation on table of contents
- Using Palatino for body, Gill Sans for headers/ToC, Monaco for code.
If you think I'm obsessing with the typography, you're absolutely right.

author: olamy
msg: declare version of plexus-component-api as a workaround of MECLIPSE-472
remove class PlexusContainerManager.java which is not used anymore
